description:
Momoka makes a boxed lunch for Fuyuki, but she`s at a loss for the perfect way to give it to him.  Then she comes up with a perfect plan: she`ll take him up in a space shuttle!  After that, Keroro learns how expensive a certain type of mushrooms are, and decides to grow them himself for the money.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Momoka, Lunch in Space / Keroro, Protect the Mushrooms!
Si on faisait un déjeuner dans l`espace / La chasse aux champignons
桃華 ちょっと宇宙でランチでも であります / ケロロ 松茸を狩れ! であります
